parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

- **PrePaid**: subscription.

- **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: ConnectionDomain
parameters.description: The endpoint of the node. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the endpoint.

parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type. For more information, see [Instance types](~~57141~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceDescription
parameters.description:
The instance name. The name must meet the following requirements:

- It must start with a Chinese character or a letter.

- It can contain digits, Chinese characters, letters, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

- It must be 2 to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID.

parameters.name: DBInstanceStatus
parameters.description: The instance status. For more information, see [Instance states](~~63870~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance architecture. Valid values:

- **sharding**: sharded cluster instance.

- **replicate**: replica set or standalone instance. This is the default value.

<props="china">

- **serverless**: serverless instance.

</props>

parameters.name: DBNodeType
parameters.description:
Filters instances by type. Valid values:

1. customized: standalone instances and DBFS instances.

2. standard: standard instances, which include replica set and sharded cluster instances.

3. default: all instances.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine. Set the value to **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: ExpireTime
parameters.description:
The expiration time of the instance. The time is in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.
This parameter is used to filter instances that expire on or before the specified time.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
The expiration status of the instance. Valid values:

- **true**: The instance is expired.

- **false**: The instance is not expired.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

- **Classic**: classic network.

- **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be greater than 0 and no greater than the maximum value of the integer data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

- **30** (default)

- **50**

- **100**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: ReplicationFactor
parameters.description:
The number of nodes in the replica set instance. Valid values:

- **3**

- **5**

- **7**

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID of the VPC.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The VPC ID.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the zone ID.
